item.title: Pete's Basement Top 5 Marvel Characers
item.itunes:author: Ripped Productions
item.description: Here it is, the answer to the question you've all been waiting for! Is Pete real or a puppet? No, that question will remain unanswered. However, Pete and the boys have answered the question; what is your Top 5 Favorite Marvel Characters. Please note: one of Ramon's top 5 consists of a DC character. We apologize about the mishap. The only thing we can ask now is that DC please sell that character to Marvel so that our Top 5 Marvel Characters Episode holds water. If not, we may be drowned by that very same water.
